title: Inauguration Gets Loud, Trump’s S#!@ty New Life 1.21.21
itunes:title: Inauguration Gets Loud, Trump’s S#!@ty New Life 1.21.21
description:
In episode 795, Jack and Miles are joined by the Bechdel Cast's Jamie Loftus to discuss Joe Biden's inauguration, conservative networks continuing to support Trump, Trump's legal troubles, racists crawling back into their holes, and more. Plus super producer Anna Hossnieh joins to talk about why we need to be taking the Armie Hammer abuse allegations more seriously.

FOOTNOTES:

  1. The inauguration of Joe Biden
  2. Fox News, OANN, and Newsmax Pretend Trump’s Not Leaving in Disgrace
  3. The Walls Are Closing In on Donald Trump
  4. Commentary: Fox News helped create the Big Lie. Now, as ratings slide, it can’t escape it
  5. Poll: Republican support for convicting Trump in Senate growing
  6. QAnon believers struggle with inauguration.
  7. We Need To Talk About Armie
  8. Armie Hammer’s ex Courtney Vucekovich: He wanted to ‘barbecue and eat’ me
  9. WATCH: Benny Sings - Rolled Up feat. Mac DeMarco

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
